summary: This mod attempts to make spells more powerful in general through racial, equipment, and standing stone bonuses.
descriptionHtml:
[b]Description[/b]
This mod attempts to make spells more powerful in such a way that it is compatible with most spell mods. 

Each Race will receive magic bonuses based on their default skill 
bonuses. For example: If a Dark Elf starts with +10 Destruction, 
Destruction spells will also deal 10% more damage.

Standing Stones have been given additional effects
Apprentice: +10% to all Spells
Atronach: +25% to Destruction.
Lady: +25% to Restoration
Lord: +10% to Restoration, Enchanting
Lover: +5% to all Spells
Mage: +20% to all spells
Ritual: +25% to Conjuration (Not Included)
Serpent: +15% to Alteration and Alchemy (Not Included)
Shadow: +25% to Illusion (Not Included)
Steed: None
Thief: +10% to Illusion and Alchemy
Tower: +25% to Alteration
Warrior: None

Enchanted Robes now increase the magnitude of spells in addition to 
reducing costs.

Collage Robes
Novice		+15%
Apprentice 	+30%
Adept		+45%
Expert		+60%
Master		+75%

An NPC named \"Yune the Whisper\" has been added to The Frozen Hearth Inn 
in Winterhold. This NPC is incomplete for the time being, but I intend to 
use her in the future.

[Installation]
A simple ESP file, drop it into your Data folder or install with NMM.

[Known Issues]
Effects may not take place when loading a previous save. Revisiting a Standing and Requiping modded equipment(Collage/Mage robes) should fix this.

[Compatibility]
Effects from this mod are Added to the game as appose to altered versions of the original.
It should be compatible with most mods.
author: Rinobi

files.name: Messing with Magic v0_81
files.changelogHtml:
Added enchantments Alteration, Conjuration, Destruction, Restoration and Illusion +75% Magnitude to the Arch Mage\'s robes(Both hooded and non hooded versions). Effects may not show up in the item description.
Added a +50 Magicka enhancement to the non hooded version of the robe.

files.name: Messing with Magic v0_82
files.changelogHtml: Arch Mage Robes now desplay magnitude effects in the item description
